title: About the MSI
body:
(Idk if this is the right place to put it, but it involves the MSI, so yeah)

So, if we're going to the MSI, we're getting one free choice of a skin from SKT, TPA, Fnatic, or Samsung, right? I definitely want the Thresh one and I'm going on May 9th. So, does that mean that I get the skin 5 days in advance? (It says they'll be released on May 14th, I believe).

Also, about the tickets. The printed option, uhh. Is it supposed to be like a giant ticket on printer paper? Thnx. (Kinda don't wanna drive to all the way there and then find out I goofed on the ticket)

replies.body:
First of all, you get a skin code for (of your choice) for each day you are at the event. If you go one day you get the skin code for that day. You can apply the code, but it will not be useable (playable in game) until it is released.

Second, All they really need from the printed tickets is the Ticket Number. Printing out the whole thing just lets them confirm the validity of the ticket (mainly by that ticket number). I have the tickets as a PDF on my phone) :3

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=spkE0flx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-29T15:45:28.478+0000)
>
> First of all, you get a skin code for (of your choice) for each day you are at the event. If you go one day you get the skin code for that day. You can apply the code, but it will not be useable (playable in game) until it is released.
> 
> Second, All they really need from the printed tickets is the Ticket Number. Printing out the whole thing just lets them confirm the validity of the ticket (mainly by that ticket number). I have the tickets as a PDF on my phone) :3

Thanks. So, I'm guessing that means the giant ticket works. ^-^
